code: @Override public void run() {     if (!stopped) {         log.debug("Trigger heartbeat request.").         for (HeartbeatMonitor<O> heartbeatMonitor : getHeartbeatTargets()) {             CompletableFuture<O> futurePayload = getHeartbeatListener().retrievePayload(heartbeatMonitor.getHeartbeatTargetId()).             final HeartbeatTarget<O> heartbeatTarget = heartbeatMonitor.getHeartbeatTarget().             if (futurePayload != null) {                 CompletableFuture<Void> requestHeartbeatFuture = futurePayload.thenAcceptAsync(payload -> heartbeatTarget.requestHeartbeat(getOwnResourceID(), payload), getExecutor()).                 requestHeartbeatFuture.exceptionally((Throwable failure) -> {                     log.warn("Could not request the heartbeat from target {}.", heartbeatTarget, failure).                     return null.                 }).             } else {                 heartbeatTarget.requestHeartbeat(getOwnResourceID(), null).             }         }     } }
